column5: Webster University continues to be highly ranked on the U.S. News & World Report’s Best Colleges report, now listed as 16th in Midwest Regional Universities and included in four best-of categories. This year, the University's score rose to its highest level since the ranking system was established.Webster University is accredited by the Higher Learning Commission and its programs are accredited and recognised by accreditation agencies in several countries. Webster holds memberships in several organisations and associations.Having the right financial tools and methodologies are of crucial importance for both small and large businesses. Webster University offers both undergraduate and graduate degrees in finance.
column7: Orlando Campus - USD 27,000 (January intake), USD 22,680 (May intake) Gateway Campus - USD 27,000 Groves Campus - USD 27,000 (January & May intake) Irvine Campus - USD 27,000
